Scaphosoma tricolor HELLER, 1917
: 46. Lectotype 6, SMTD; type locality: Luzon, Mt. Makiling. Lectotype designation: LÖBL 1970a : 126; apical margin of elytra: LÖBL 1971a : 249. Additional published records. Palawan: Pinigisan; Balabac: Dalawan Bay ( LÖBL 1971a: 250 )

.
